ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Gammarus lacustris 5.2 ug/l/96 hr at 21 °C, mature (95% confidence limit 4.1-6.5 ug/l) /technical material, 95.3%/. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l.

LC50 Gammarus fasciatus 10-100 ug/l/96 hr at 16 °C, mature /technical material, 95.3%/. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l.

LC50 Palaemonetes 1.2 ug/l/96 hr at 21 °C, mature (95% confidence limit 0.8-1.4 ug/l) /technical material, 95.3%/. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l.

LC50 Ictalurus punctatus (Channel catfish) 6000 ug/l/96 hr at 18 °C, wt 1.1 g (95% confidence limit 5740-6270 ug/l) /technical material, 95.3%/. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l.

LC50 Lepomis cyanellus (Green sunfish) 280 ug/l/96 hr at 18 °C, wt 0.8 g (95% confidence limit 186-422 ug/l) /technical material, 95.3%/. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l.

LC50 Lepomis macrochirus (Bluegill) 13 ug/l/96 hr at 18 °C, wt 1.1 g (95% confidence limit 10-16 ug/l) /technical material, 95.3%/. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l.
LD50 Mallards oral 121 mg/kg (95% confidence limit 95.9-152 mg/kg), male, 3-4 mo old /Purity 94.65%/
LD50 Sharp-tailed grouse oral 75.6-170 mg/kg, male, adult /Purity 94.65%/
LD50 Pheasant, oral 269 mg/kg (95% confidence limit 194-373 mg/kg), male, 3-4 mo old /Purity 94.65%/
